comment._content: Sherman was Vice President to William H. Taft. He was the last VP to die in office. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_S._Sherman

comment.author: 34981452@N08
comment._content: There is still a Schoolcraft St. in Utica. He is apparently buried in Utica: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=2716 This looks *maybe* like it was taken in the Hotel Utica which has undergone historic renovation.
